ThunderShock.name: Thunder Shock
ThunderShock.describtion: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage.

ShockWave.name: Shock Wave
ShockWave.describtion: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity.

Earwhip.name: Earwhip
Earwhip.describtion: The user electrifies the target with its ears to inflict damage.

ThunderPunch.name: Thunder Punch
ThunderPunch.describtion: The target is punched with an electrified fist.

Discharge.name: Discharge
Discharge.describtion: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user.

Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
Thunderbolt.describtion: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target.

ElectroBall.name: Electro Ball
ElectroBall.describtion: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage.

Thunder.name: Thunder
Thunder.describtion: The user charges at its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity.
